text: Rwose twohereje intumwa zacu tuzihaye ibimenyetso bigaragara n’ibitangaza, ndetse tunazihishurira ibitabo n’ubutabera, kugira ngo abantu bimakaze ubutabera. Twanamanuye icyuma cy’ubutare gifite imbaraga zihambaye kandi kinafitiye abantu akamaro. (Ibyo byose byakozwe) kugira ngo Allah yerekane abamutabara (abatabara idini rye) ndetse n’Intumwa ze kandi batamuzi. Mu by’ukuri Allah ni Umunyacyubahiro bihebuje, Utsinda
